Dedicated servant of the public interest ia broadcasting
The Board of Directors of the national Association
of Educational Broadcasters, in surveying the developments
responsible for the present stage of progress and maturity
in educational broadcasting in America, acknowledges with
profound gratitude the distinctive contribution of ^*ymour
Krieger.
His individual efforts set an example for all to
follow in the continuing struggle for equitable assignment
and vise use of television channels; his personal integrity
compelled his clients and associates to search always for
ethical concerns and lasting values; and his devotion
beyond duty, bis relentless drive towards full realization
of the public benefits of broadcasting provided an inspiring
entry in the pens&aent record of radio and television
achievementsâ€¢
President
Chairman,
Board of Directors
Washington, D.C.
October 25, 1961
THE NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
